Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Dearborn.
ShortDescription: Northbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Wacker, Clark  due to street blockage near Wacker/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Wacker, Clark then resume their normal route on Archer due to street blockage near Wacker/Dearborn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State and #22 Clark Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State, 22 Clark, 151 Sheridan, 36 Broadway and 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near Wacker/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #29 State, #22 Clark, #151 Sheridan, #36 Broadway and #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near Wacker/Dearborn.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Illinois, Dearborn and over regular route.

#29 State buses will operate via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Illinois and over regular route.

#62 Archer buses will operate via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Wacker, Clark and over regular route.

#151 Sheridan buses will operate via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Illinois, State and over regular route.

#36 Broadway buses will operate via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Illinois, State and over regular route.

#124 Navy Pier buses will operate via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Illinois and over regular route.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/79th
ShortDescription: Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Vincennes 83rd, due to street blockage near Lafayette/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Vincennes 83rd and resume normal route due to  street blockage near Lafayette/79th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
